phrases: You know, we have got a lot of only children in our group, huh?
I have got a little brother.
And I have an older sister.
And I have an older sister.
But the biggest shock of them all is that Shu's an older brother.
-Calm down, he does not have that many!
-Calm down, he does not have that many!
I only found out when I went over to Shu's house not too long ago.
I totally figured his little sister would be all...
They look pretty similar, but she was not all that friendly with him.
Cannot believe Iura's a big brother.
He is pretty chill outside of school.
Let us go get ourselves burgerfied after school, whaddya think?!
You would better start acting more responsible!
Student Council Room It May Seem Like Hate
Student Council Room It May Seem Like Hate
Student Council Room It May Seem Like Hate
God, Shu, you are such a clown.
God, Shu, you are such a clown.
God, Shu, you are such a clown.
Iura-kun is quite the comedian, is not he?
Hey, Yanagi-kun, why do you always talk so formally?
Yeah, you have been super polite to us ever since the day we met.
Sorry, I suppose it is just habit.
But you are real casual with Yuki.
Remi-Remi, I do not know if I should be impressed or weirded out.
Oh, are you guys heading home?
I am not sure why that is...
I would sure like to know why.
Okay, Yanagi, why do not you start calling everyone by their first name?
It is times like these that I get really jealous of Iura's peppy personality.
Everyone wants to be closer friends with Yanagi
It is times like these that I get really jealous of Iura's peppy personality.
Everyone wants to be closer friends with Yanagi
You can use my first name, too!
You can use my first name, too!
I have never called a friend by their first name before.
I do not think it will come easily to me.
Oh, no, he is certainly not bothering me...
But I would like to become closer friends with Ishikawa-kun and Miyamura-kun...
And of course, all the rest of you, too.
What is going on in here?
This is quite the odd bunch.
Look, Yanagi, we were not friends with this guy here until recently, either!
But look how close we are now!
But look how close we are now!
Boy, you could not pay me to do that with the Prez.
They managed to creep out Iura-kun!
That is quite the feat, Ishikawa-kun, Miyamura-kun!
We are good buds now, right?
We got to be best buds right away, too!
O-Of course we are best buds!
I am best buds with all of you, Yanagi-kun, too!
Let us finish'i am off with a wrestling move!
I am going to go follow Yuki.
Let us finish'i am off with a wrestling move!
Best buds can settle any argument with rock-paper-scissors!
Do not blatantly lie to him, Ishikawa-kun!
You lose way more than I do!
I am not that bad at rock-paper-scissors, am I?
You lose every time we decide who goes to the vending machines.
Fine, then I will win next time.
Would it be all right if I called you Toru, Ishikawa-kun?
Please, let me do this one at a time!
Well, I want to be next!
Are you going to start calling him Akane?
It would be weird if I were the only one.
I mean, I could, I just need a bit of time.
Yanagi-kun might be on my personal blacklist, I guess.
Why is he on your blacklist?!
That is not a very funny joke, you know!
I will not take them away.
What is he going to take from you?
Or did he already take it?
You are a big dummy, Akane!
What the heck was he talking about?
Yanagi looks happy'bout it, at least.
Look, I told you, you are wrong!
I am taller than him by a little, right?
We are the same height, are not we?
Wait, are you two fighting or something?
Akane just said he got taller.
And Miyamura-kun said I did not!
No, because I am taller than Akane!
Well, I told him neither of us are 170 centimeters tall, and he got all mad!
And you should not have blown up at him either, Yanagi-kun!
I am glad the two of them are such close friends.
Sawada, how do you feel about this one?
Wow, you have gotten a lot better with guys lately, huh.
You know, we are your friends, not inanimate objects.
Sorry, I just wanted to see how comfortable Sawada's getting with guys.
I can handle up to Sengoku.
I can handle up to Sengoku.
Wait, where do I rank, then?!
Wait, where do I rank, then?!
I have got some snacks here, Sawada-san.
You can have all of these!
Look, she is eatin' them right outta my hand!
I will shake up that tier list.
I will shake up that tier list.
C'mon, now, Sawada-san, it is me, Iura!
Iura-kun, you have got some learning to do.
Sawada, Iura-kun is not trying to scare you.
I mean, I do not care if he is a good guy.
I cannot stand people who are loud and annoying.
You coming down with a cold, Iura?
Well, you are acting like the same old Iura...
But I do feel... kind of fatigued.
C'mon, you have totally got a fever, too!
Why are you grabbing me like this?!
Why are you grabbing me like this?!
If it hurts that bad, then go the hell home!
Do not get anyone else sick!
Going the same way so might as well help out, but cannot say anything because his throat hurts
Going the same way so might as well help out, but cannot say anything because his throat hurts Terrified because someone just grabbed the box out of her hands
Do not get anyone else sick!
Man, I went home, gargled mouthwash and passed out, and I am feelin' great!
At least say the whole word!
Wait, why are you congratulating me for beating a cold, anyway?
Your little sister's studying for high school exams.
Wait, you think he is mad at you?
-I have never seen him angry, ever.
-I have never seen him angry, ever.
AND I MANAGED TO PISS HIM OFF!
-I have never seen him angry, ever.
AND I MANAGED TO PISS HIM OFF!
H-Hold on, is he really mad at you?
H-Hold on, is he really mad at you?
I can hear him laughing, so I think you are okay.
Do you want him to like you?
Whoa, it is Kono-san and Sawada-san!
Oh, Miyamura's not here, but Hori-san is!
What are you and Kono-san talking about?
Wait, if it is private, you do not have to say!
Sheesh, the science room is so far away from the second-year classrooms.
I was worried you would end up late to class!
You want to try for East High?
And you are dead set on it?
You might want to aim a rank lower.
I do not think your grades in any subject would be high enough...
But that is not to say that is bad, no.
You may want to think that over once more.
Give it some thought, then come back to me...
I am not going to have dinner tonight.
I told my teacher where I wanted to go for high school, and he laughed at me.
Why does him laughing at you mean you are not going to eat dinner?
Th-That is not what I meant.
You are going to eat dinner.
Where do you want to go, Moto?
You are going to laugh, too.
I want to know where you want to go.
Wait, I thought it was going to be some funny name!
That is not funny at all!
My teacher did not laugh at the name, dummy!
You are always throwing your notes and textbooks at me, so I took a peek.
The pages of your textbooks are worn down from how much you study.
You highlight and write notes all over them, too.
I will punch his lights out.
I will do it so you do not have to.
I try, but my grades keep slipping.
My teacher said it is hopeless.
He said I should rethink things.
Their grades are good enough to get in, but mine...
What should I do, big bro?
I do not know what to do!
I try, and I try, and I try,
but I cannot make it happen.
If you do not get in, you will have to try a lower-ranked school,
but you could totally get into Katagiri.
Just do the best you can.
And eat your fill of dinner.
Hey, Hori-san, I have got a favor to ask.
Iu... er, your brother sent you over, yeah?
Head upstairs, the door right at the top is my room.
Go on in and sit wherever.
I will go get us some drinks.
Guess she is got two brothers...
You want me to tutor your little sister?
I just want you to see if she could test into East High.
I mean, if that is all, then sure.
And if there is no way she will get in, I want you to tell her straight out.
Just help her out a little, at least till the exam.
He looked like a big brother there.
You look a lot like your brother.
Has anyone ever told you that?
I suppose because both me and my brother are the quiet, brooding type.
I, uh, brought my textbooks, and my notes and stuff, too.
I know it is tough trying to study in a stranger's house right off the bat.
You get the day off today!
Once you have relaxed a little, we can get to studying.
If you want more people to talk to,
I can call in our resident high-school and elementary-school boys.
Hey, bro, who was that girl?
Today I have got banana cupcakes!
Let us show her we are rooting for her.
Middle schoolers have cell phones, now?!
Oh, but I do not have contact info for much of my class.
I basically only text my brother.
We barely talk, and when I come home late, he just sends me an angry text.
We could be in the same house and he will text me instead of talking!
You do not think he hates me?
Yo, Shu, what are you so worried about?
Which one will make her pass the test for sure?
I will just go with the biggest one, then.
Um, they are all the same size...
Then I will take the most expensive one.
If she wants it, I guess.
You bought it for her, right?
I am sure it will be fine.
